comments:
EBNFInjector generates exception when it uses MDR, when some model elements that do not have a location attribute.

An example from injecetion (excerpt):

Cannot set property location on element IN!Customer : OCL!Class to '1:9-1:17' : String (old value is null)
javax.jmi.reflect.InvalidNameException
    at ocl.Class$Impl._getAttribute(Unknown Source)
    at org.netbeans.mdr.handlers.FeaturedHandler.refGetValue(FeaturedHandler.java:152)     at org.netbeans.mdr.handlers.InstanceHandler.refGetValue(InstanceHandler.java:367)     at 

...
